name: Sky Dominion
description:
Sky Dominion is a War Simulation-like shooter where the player has to protect their aircraft, while being attacked from the ground, until the aircraft reaches the end of its capabilities and the round ends. At the end of every round the player can see the score they reached.

Gun Types:

Chain Gun - A machine gun firing incendiary ammo.
Missiles - Basic rocket/missile launcher.
Homing Missiles - Rockets/missiles that follow a selected target.

Instead of the basic Thermal Vision that the game offers it also has a Night Vision mode, for a more realistic and immersive feel.
